source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	[Item No] as [No_],
	[New Item No] as [No_ 2],
	[Item Name] as [Description],
	[Item Name2] as  [Description 2],
	[Short Name],
	[Item Category Code],
	[Product Group Code],
	[Sub Brand],
	[Item Class],
	[Item Class Scheme],
	[Base Unit of Measure],
	[Pack Size],
	[Pack Size Information],	
	[Pack Title],
	[Pack Title Description],
	[Pcs Per Case],
	[Pack Group Code],
	[2Way Item],
	[Container Type],
	[FG Category],
	[Packaging Type],
	[SKU Category],
	[Jar Deposit],
	[Selling Price],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Item]
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT
	[Item No] as [No_],
	[New Item No] as [No_ 2],
	[Item Name] as [Description],
	[Item Name2] as  [Description 2],
	[Short Name],
	[Item Category Code],
	[Product Group Code],
	[Sub Brand],
	[Item Class],
	[Item Class Scheme],

	[Pack Size],
	[Pack Size Information],

	[Pack Title Description],
